name: Schema

methods.name: getGlobalDescribe
methods.description: Returns a map of all sObject names (keys) to sObject tokens (values) for the standard and custom objects defined in your organization.

methods.name: describeDataCategoryGroups
methods.description: Returns a list of the category groups associated with the specified objects.

methods.name: describeSObjects
methods.description: Describes metadata (field list and object properties) for the specified sObject or array of sObjects.

methods.name: describeTabs
methods.description: Returns information about the standard and custom apps available to the running user.

methods.name: GroupStructures
methods.description: Returns available category groups along with their data category structure for objects specified in the request.

description: Contains methods for obtaining schema describe information.
